title: I can not get a box!?
body: i get more keys than boxes some player's get more boxes than keys i have a problem with boxes :/

replies.body: The drop rates of keys gradually decrease the more you earn them until it resets roughly every 28 days.  Mastery chests are a bit different and require a few prerequisites like having to own the champion and not having already received it for that champion this season.  More information on this is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions, I'm happy to help!
